Posts.Content: Shellie I am so happy for you that the biopsy was benign. A few years ago I had a small lump removed from my breast and it was benign. I was so scared. Take care Shellie. Nadine
Posts.Title: Waiting For Biopsy Results

Posts.Content: TJ I am so sorry you are going through this. I don't blame you for being upset with the Dr. That's a long wait to see the surgeon. My prayers are with you. Please keep us updated. Sincerely Nadine
Posts.Title: Core Needle Biopsy Results 1 2

Posts.Content: Brandy I know you are worried but it is more than likely benign. My prayers are with you. I hope you'll update. Take care, Nadine
Posts.Title: Lump behind my nipple...and I'm worried!
